meta.title_zh: 找不到商品，請店員幫忙

dialogue.text: Hi, can I help you find something?
dialogue.zh:
嗨, 可以 我 幫忙 你 找 東西?
こんにちは, できます 私 手伝う あなた 探す something?

是的, 我 可以’t 找 東西.
はい, 私 できます’t 探す something.

What 是 你 在找 ?
What are あなた 探して for?

Instant noodles.
Instant noodles.

任何 brand 你 like?
Any brand あなた like?

不, 任何 brand 是 fine.
いいえ, any brand 私 fine.

dialogue.text: Do you want spicy or not spicy?
dialogue.zh:
你 想要 spicy or not spicy?
Do あなた want spicy or not spicy?

Not too spicy.
Not too spicy.

dialogue.text: They’re in aisle three, near the drinks.
dialogue.zh:
They’re in 走道 three, near the drinks.
They’re in 通路 three, near the drinks.

好的, 走道 three.
わかりました, 通路 three.

dialogue.text: Do you see the snacks section?
dialogue.zh:
你 see the snacks section?
Do あなた see the snacks section?

是的, 我’m near the snacks.
はい, 私’m near the snacks.

dialogue.text: Great. Walk straight, then turn left.
dialogue.zh:
太好了. Walk straight, then turn left.
いいですね. Walk straight, then turn left.

Got it.
Got it.

dialogue.text: It should be on the middle shelf.
dialogue.zh:
It should be on the middle shelf.
It should be on the middle shelf.

Middle shelf, 好的.
Middle shelf, わかりました.

dialogue.text: If you want cups, they’re on the top shelf.
dialogue.zh:
If 你 想要 cups, they’re on the top shelf.
If あなた want cups, they’re on the top shelf.

我 想要 cups, 謝謝.
私 want cups, ありがとう.

你 also 需要 chopsticks?
Do あなた also 必要 chopsticks?

是的, 請.
はい, お願いします.

dialogue.text: We have them near the cashier.
dialogue.zh:
We 有 them near the cashier.
We have them near the cashier.

Alright.
Alright.

Anything else 你’re 在找 ?
Anything else あなた’re 探して for?

Maybe bottled 水.
Maybe bottled 水.

dialogue.text: Water is next to the fridge.
dialogue.zh:
水 是 next to the fridge.
水 私 next to the fridge.

Perfect.
Perfect.

dialogue.text: Let me know if you can’t find it.
dialogue.zh:
Let me know if 你 可以’t 找 it.
Let me know if あなた できます’t 探す it.

Will .
Will do.

不 problem. Take your time.
いいえ problem. Take your time.

謝謝 你!
ありがとう あなた!
